Journal Story: Getting excited for everyone reading entries about prepping for the AT. Also here in Harrisonburg, VA, where I live outside of the Local shop is having a send-off Thursday night for locals heading out. That and decent weather is getting me anxious. Safe travels all & looking forward to updates.
Just attended a local sendoff party for a local crew of 5 starting the trail next week. It gives me the itch to get out on a trail again, and a nice forecast next week clinches it. Good luck to all!
Liking everyone's updates and insight, hoping the warmer weather sticks around for all of you!
